summary: This code changes the current directory (CD) and then runs a test script named "test_make_dog_cat_connection.py" using the pytest-3 command, specifically focusing on the test function "test_query". This might be related to testing connections between dog and cat data.

details.comment: This code changes the current directory (CD) and then runs a test script named "test_make_dog_cat_connection.py" using the pytest-3 command, specifically focusing on the test function "test_query". This might be related to testing connections between dog and cat data.
details.content:
cd . # really sure that is just because of insufficient power supply for external drives?
pytest-3 -s test_make_dog_cat_connection.py::test_query
